*The R package `rdwd`, available at [github.com/brry](https://github.com/brry/rdwd), contains code to select and download weather data from measuring stations across Germany. (Vignette [Rmd source](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brry/rdwd/master/vignettes/rdwd.Rmd))*


## Package installation

```{r install, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("rdwd")
# development version from github:
berryFunctions::instGit("brry/rdwd") 
```

```{r library}
library(rdwd)
```
